long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calorie Monster is a powerful calorie and macro-nutrient counter with a pleasant user interface. You'll also find a cheeky monster on the main page that grows in colour as you progress towards your goal throughout the day. It combines Angular and mySQL technology to produce an engaging and robust calorie counting applicaiton that features a calendar function alongside a massive database of food items.
